Title: American Relief Agency - Report on American relief work. 7
Notes: The Relief Agency has set up more than 33 institutes for children's support, where they can be cared for, educated and provided with food. All in all, the Relief Agency has set up 96 of such projects, divided over 26 provinces.Nr. 7 of the poster set on the Economic Aid Agreement between the United States of America and the Republic of China (3 July 1948).
